FACTORING & DISCOUNT NO. 2, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. CENTRAL MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. No. 26, Docket 23087. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Oct. 15, 1954. Decided Oct. 29, 1954. Harte & Natanson, New York City, M. Theodore Chester, New York City, of counsel, for plaintiff-appellant. Max J. Gwertzman, New York City, for defendant-appellant.

Before CHASE, MEDINA and HARLAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion below, D.C., 125 F.Supp. 627.
